channel.title: Help with dark bow
channel.description: I have used silabs v3 client for a week and ive wanted to fix the dark bow but i dont know how soe can someone please help me?

compiled it no errors now testing if it works and i repped u[br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2007, 01:05:10 PM[/size][hr]it worked and i fixed all godswords and sara sword and zammy spear

item.title: Help with dark bow
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Simple, just find:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) //bows

And the 4214,859,861 are all weapon ids, simply add:
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) //bows

This adds the dark bow with these bows, and the dark bow will shoot with rune arrows. Hope i helped, if you have any questions, just ask. =)

Read full topic
